tweets.text: RT @sidecarcap: Invest in businesses that scale with people you can trust.
... producing non zero sum outcomes, and improved quality of life.

Effective writing expresses a clear point of view. Interesting writing tells me something I don't know. Useful writing tells me why a common belief is wrong.

Tell me what you think: I'll figure out what's what.
The two types of growth https://t.co/tLVvQDq8PA
There are essentially only two decision trees you need to explore today to find value creation online:
Not zero sum; you are both correct. The bridge is linear vs exponential returns. These returns are relevant to analyze given shift from tangible to intangible assets. https://t.co/xnnT0gEteg
Consolidated margins, reinvestment, & unit economics https://t.co/eNra4zR0ZH https://t.co/5VCPH6VstL
Customer value proposition, unit economics, business model defensibility, reinvestment runway, unique cultural attributes https://t.co/cOHylTvcNW
